=== Current Issues ===

* Suspend does not always work: recovering from it may show an frozen icon on screen (intrepid)
* Line out does not work (intrepid)
* Problem with touchpad/mouse. The mouse pointer sometimes jumps when mouse is clicked. (karmic)
